org.workflowsim
Class Task

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Cloudlet
      org.workflowsim.Task
Direct Known Subclasses:
Job
public class Task
extends Cloudlet

Task is an extention to Cloudlet in CloudSim. It supports the implementation of dependencies between tasks, which includes a list of parent tasks and a list of child tasks that it has. In WorkflowSim, the Workflow Engine assure that a task is released to the scheduler (ready to run) when all of its parent tasks have completed successfully

Since:
WorkflowSim Toolkit 1.0

Constructor Detail

Task

public Task(int taskId,
            long taskLength)
Allocates a new Task object. The task length should be greater than or equal to 1.

Parameters:
taskId - the unique ID of this Task
taskLength - the length or size (in MI) of this task to be executed in a PowerDatacenter
